Scott Rodgerson

 

/ Advertising

Advertising

Scott Rodgerson is an art director and armchair copywriter trained at Mohawk College's McKeil School of Business.

Rodgerson's work has been recognized by Applied Arts, the One Show, and won gold at the 2013 Canadian Marketing Association Awards alongside his partners Marco Buchar, Shawn Walton, and Erikson Melton.

For a full view of any piece, hover over an image, click the + symbol, and select the download icon.
